ðŸ“– Summary: OmniAvatar is a project focused on efficient audio-driven avatar video generation with adaptive body animation. It provides model weights and inference code for both 1.3B and 14B parameter models, along with LoRA and audio condition weights. The project leverages Hugging Face for model distribution and includes instructions for installation, model download, and inference.
